name: CFTreeContext
desc: Structure containing program-defined data and callbacks for a CFTree object.

items.name: init(version: CFIndex, info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, retain: CFTreeRetainCallBack!, release: CFTreeReleaseCallBack!, copyDescription: CFTreeCopyDescriptionCallBack!)
var copyDescription: CFTreeCopyDescriptionCallBack!
items.desc: The callback used to provide a description of the info field.

items.name: var info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: A C pointer to a program-defined block of data, referred to as the information pointer.

items.name: var release: CFTreeReleaseCallBack!
items.desc: The callback used to release a previously retained info field. If this parameter is not a pointer to a function of the correct prototype, the behavior is undefined. This value may be NULL.

items.name: var retain: CFTreeRetainCallBack!
items.desc: The callback used to retain the info field. If this parameter is not a pointer to a function of the correct prototype, the behavior is undefined. This value may be NULL.

items.name: var version: CFIndex
items.desc: The version number of the structure type being passed in as a parameter to a CFTree creation function. This structure is version 0.
